name: Downfall of Perception
description:
You won't get away from anxiety, while the light from windows of abandoned home still convulsing in your shadows.

You will have to solve several problems while traveling strange collapsing world.

To an extent, this is an experiment with some mechanics, atmosphere, generation and linear story.  Although the game is completely passable to the end, it still needs some logic and balance improvements.

(Pice of Readme from github)

Version: 1.0 beta

Github: DownfallOfPerception

Used resources:

  • For raw sound records i used sounds from here: freetousesounds
  • I also took a piece of Grouper - Poison tree
